errorMinSigners: Number of signers must be greater than 0.
errorHighSignerThreshold: Threshold must be less than number of signers.
helperSigThreshold: The number of signers required to approve a transaction on this multisig.
subTitleSignerAddresses: These addresses will be able to approve or reject transactions on this multisig.
helperNFTWeight: How many votes is this token worth?
helperChooseGovernance: Select a governance schema for your DAO.
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time where voting is enabled after a proposal is created.
helperQuorumERC20: The percentage of total possible token votes required to vote on a proposal to make the result valid.
helperQuorumERC721: The minimum weight of total available token voting weight required to vote on a proposal to make the result valid.
governanceDescription: These values can be modified later.
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time a successful proposal must be passed within.
helperTimelockPeriod: The length of time a successful proposal must wait to be passed on the blockchain.
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent (out of {{totalVotes}}) to freeze this child DAO entirely.
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) for a Freeze Vote's starting and ending point.
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a successful Freeze Vote will freeze this child DAO.
freezeGuardDescription: This configuration may be changed later via a proposal on this child DAO.
helperParentAllocation: The total number of tokens claimable by all parent token holders.
helperTokenName: Enter the name of your governance token, i.e. DAO.
helperTokenSupply: The total number of tokens to be created.
descMultisigGov: Best for small groups and/or frequent onchain activity.
descAzoriusErc20Gov: Best for distributing power through liquid fungible tokens.
descAzoriusErc20HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members.
descAzoriusErc721Gov: Best for adding governance capabilities to an NFT collection.
descAzoriusErc721HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members.
labelTokenContractAlreadyConfigured: Your DAO is already configured with an ERC-20 token which will be used for DAO governance with this modification.
helperAllocations: Any unallocated tokens will be placed in the newly deployed DAO treasury.
helperProposers: Only these whitelisted Roles members would be able to create proposals.
helperNewToken: Create a new ERC-20 token to vote with.
helperExistingToken: Use an existing ERC-20 token contract for voting.
errorNotVotingToken: This token cannot be used for voting.
snapshotHelper: Link a Snapshot Space via ENS to include offchain proposals and voting.
toastDisconnectedPersistent: You'll need to connect your wallet to deploy this DAO.
tooltipNftVoting: NFT Voting allows a group of ERC-721 (NFT) holders to propose and vote on transactions. Multiple NFT addresses can be used. <1>Learn more</1>
errorUnsupportedCreateOption: Previously selected Governance option is not supported on this network.
networkDescription: What network would you like to deploy this DAO on?
attachFractalModuleDescription: This setting controls whether Parent DAO will be able to execute arbitrary transactions on Child DAO bypassing voting process on Child DAO.
fractalModuleAttachedDescription: This setting can not be modified as Fractal Module already attached to the DAO.
helperTokenLocking: Whether the tokens are initially transferable.
descTokenUnlocked: Tokens are unlocked and can be freely transferred.
descTokenLocked: Tokens are initially locked. They are not transferable except for the DAO and whitelisted addresses. Token holders have normal proposal and voting power. DAO can vote to add addresses to the whitelist or to unlock.
